Scriptogram Sublime Text 2 ================================ Description ------------ This addon was made for use on [http://scriptogr.am/](http://scriptogr.am/) but it may work on other markdown flavored blogging platforms. It adds a properly fomatted heading as seen below: 
---
Title: My blog post
Date: 2012-05-20 09:30
---
Usage ------- After installing press ctrl+shift+p (Windows, Linux) or cmd+shift+p (OS X) and start typing scriptogram and hit enter Package Installation --------------------- If not using [Package Control](http://wbond.net/sublime_packages/package_control), you can install it manually: Bring up a command line in the Packages/ folder of your Sublime user folder, and execute the following: 
mkdir Scriptogram 
cd Scriptogram 
git clone git://github.com/scttcper/Scriptogram.git
When you launch Sublime Text 2, it will reload the packages in the packages folder. Features --------- Were listed in the description. It really only does one simple thing. Planned Features ----------------- *Some sort of open save box with preformatted save file name(similar to website) and in correct dropbox location (not sure if last part is possible).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
